text: Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ ifongiar kurar gumazir igiabar navibar otiviba nɨ akɨrim ragh dagh asaragh. Egh nɨ, arazir aghuiba, ko nɨghnɨzir gavgavim, ko igharazir darazir ifongezir arazim, ko navir amɨrɨzimɨn arazim, arazir kabanang nɨ bar pamtem dar suiragh dar gɨn mangɨ. Nɨ, gumazir Godɨn damazimɨn zueziba, me Ekiamɨn ziam fer gumazamiziba, nɨ me ko ikɨva arazir kabar amu.
